name: Unhaunt
description:
THIS GAME IS DEFINITELY UNFINISHED. THE ENEMIES SHOULDN'T SEE THROUGH THE WALLS.

ALSO IF YOU'RE EXPERIENCING GRAPHICAL ISSUES TURN THE GRAPHICS DOWN TO MEDIUM SETTINGS.

As you travel through the levels, your objective is to blow out all of the candles without being seen by the enemies, the enemies you may ask? Are ghost capturing drones, ready to stop you in your path, and remove your presence from the Hollington Hotel, they do this (if you're wondering) by firing their ghost removing laser at you if you get into their line of sight.

Controls-
-Move mouse to change direction (Since you constantly move forward)
-Enter to restart

Art (models and textures), the sounds that I didn't have time to include, and the description by Wuksy
